select u.id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.email, u.phonenumber, u.gender,u.avatar, u.is_delete, u.create_time, u.dept_id,u.is_lock,r.role_name from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.id left join sys_user_role s on u.id = s.user_id left join sys_role r on r.id = s.role_id
AND u.user_name like concat(#{param.userName}, '%')
AND u.phonenumber like concat(#{param.phonenumber}, '%')
AND date_format(u.create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{param.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(u.create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{param.endTime},'%y%m%d')
AND (u.dept_id = #{param.deptId} OR u.dept_id IN ( SELECT t.id FROM sys_dept t WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{param.deptId},t.ancestors) ))
select user_name userName, phonenumber, `password` from sys_user where (user_name = #{account} or phonenumber = #{account}) and `password` = #{password} and is_delete = 0
select su.id,su.user_name userName, sr.role_name roleName from sys_user su left join sys_user_role ur on su.id = ur.user_id left join sys_role sr on sr.id = ur.role_id where su.id = #{id}
